# Project 10: Templates & AI

Test template system and AI generation features.

## Purpose
Test template-based and AI-powered pipeline creation:
- Template gallery browsing
- Template instantiation
- AI pipeline generation
- Copilot features

## Time Required
~1 hour

## Prerequisites
- Studio running
- LLM provider configured (for AI generation)

## Test Areas

### 10.1 Template Gallery
- Browse templates
- Search and filter
- View template details

### 10.2 Template Instantiation
- Create pipeline from template
- Variable replacement
- Customization

### 10.3 AI Pipeline Generation
- Natural language prompts
- Generated pipeline validation
- Iteration/refinement

### 10.4 Copilot Features
- Suggestions
- Explanations
- Debug assistance

## Note
AI features require a configured LLM provider and may have variable outputs.
